mapinfo.detailsText:
Colonies have been settled on the coasts of this wild region. 
 Inland resources are plentiful but sea provides a mean to get an edge economically. 
 Nootka settlements and naval presence are key to control land and sea respectively. 
 
 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -NativeCiv: Nootka 
 -Mercenaries: Comanchero / Renegado 
 
 --------------------------------- 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Map designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
